gurmukhi: C`ky CoB Cu`ty kys ]sMGr sUr isMGn Bys ]554]
transliteration: Chhakke Chhodhh Chhoutte Kes|| Sanhar Soor Singhan Bhes||554||
translation: With garbs like lions the warriors are highly infuriated and their hair have loosened.554.

gurmukhi: tu`tr tIk tu`ty top ]B`gy BUp BMnI Dop ]
transliteration: Touttar Teek Toutte Top|| Bhagge Bhoop Bhannidhop||
translation: The helmets have broken and the kings have fled away;

gurmukhi: Gu`my Gwie JUmI BUm ]AauJV JwV DUmM DUm ]555]
transliteration: Ghoumme Ghaae Jhoomibhoom|| Aujhad Jhaad Dhooman Dhoom||555||
translation: The warriors, having been wounded, are falling on the earth after swinging and with a bang they are falling.555.

gurmukhi: b`jy nwd bwd Apwr ]s`jy sUr vIr juJwr ]
transliteration: Bajje Naad Baad Apaar|| Sajje Soor Veer Jujhaar||
translation: The large trumpets have resounded and the bedecked warriors are being seen;

gurmukhi: ju`Jy tUk tUk hÍY Kyq ]m`qy m`d jwx Acyq ]556]
transliteration: Jujjhe Took Took Hvai Khet|| Matte Madd Jaan Achet||556||
translation: They are dying in the war being chopped in bits and being intoxicated in war-frenzy, they are becoming unconscious.556.

gurmukhi: Cu`ty ssqR AsqR AnMq ]rMgy rMg BUm durMq ]
transliteration: Chhoutte Sastra Astra Anant|| Rane Ran Bhoom Durant||
translation: Innumerable weapons and arms are being used and the earth is coloured with blood upto a great distance;

gurmukhi: Ku`ly AMD DuMD hiQAwr ]b`ky sUr vIr ibkRwr ]557]
transliteration: Khulle Andh Dhoundh Hathiaar|| Bakke Soor Veer Bikraar||557||
translation: The weapons are being struck indiscreetly and the terrible warriors are shouting.557.

gurmukhi: ibQurI lu`Q ju`Q Anyk ]m`cy koit B`gy eyk ]
transliteration: Bithuriloutth Joutth Anek|| Machche Kottee Bhagge Ek||
translation: The clusters of corpses are lying scattered; the warriors are engrossed in a horrible war on one side and on the other, some of them are running away.

gurmukhi: h`sy BUq pRyq mswx ]lu`Jy ju`J ru`J kiRpwx ]558]
transliteration: Hasse Bhoot Prêt Masaan|| Lujjhe Jujjh Rujjh Kridaan||558||
translation: The ghosts and friends are laughing in the cemeteries and here the brave fighters are fighting after receiving blows of swords.558.

gurmukhi: AiDk ros kr rwj pKrIAw DwvhI ]rwm rwm ibnu sMk pukwrq AwvhI ]
transliteration: Adhik Ros Kar Raaj Pakdareeaa Dhaav-hee|| Raam Raam Bin(u) Sank Poukaarat Aav-hee||
translation: The demon warriors wearing armours, march forward in great fury, but on reaching within the forces of Ram, they become like followers of Ram and begin to shout the name of Ram;

gurmukhi: ru`J ju`J JV pVq BXwnk BUm pr ]rwmcMdR ky hwQ gey BvisMD qr ]559]
transliteration: Rujjh Jujjh Jhad Padat Bhayaanak Bhoom Par|| Raamchanndra Ke Haath Gad Bhavsindh Tar||559||
translation: While fighting they fall down on the earth in a dreadful posture and ferring across the world-ocean at the hands of Ram.559.

gurmukhi: ismt swNg sMgHY smuh huAY jUJhI ]tUk tUk huAY igrq n Gr kh bUJhI ]
transliteration: Simat Saan Sanrahai Samuh Huai Joojh-hee|| Took Took Huai Girat Na Ghar Kah Boodhe-hee||
translation: After revolving and holding the lance the warriors come forward and fight and fall down on being chopped into bits;

gurmukhi: KMf KMf huAY igrq KMf Dn KMf rn ]qnk qnk lg jwNih Asn kI Dwr qn ]560]
transliteration: Khanndkhanndhuai Girat Khannddhan Khanndran|| Tanak Tanak Lag Jaanh(i) Asan Kidhaar Tan||560||
translation: On receiving only the small blows of the edge of swords the brave fighters fall down in numerous part.560.
